fishlist.name: Mahi Mahi
fishlist.message: This data is an average value from FDA data published at: http://www.cfsan.fda.gov/~frf/seamehg2.html

fishlist.name: Orange Roughy
fishlist.message: In addition to being high in mercury, Orange Roughy has seen dramatic declines in many fisheries. From a sustainability perspective it is best to avoid eating orange roughy.

fishlist.name: Salmon - Atlantic
fishlist.message: While salmon tends to be low in mercury, farmed salmon contain higher levels of PCB's. Salmon farms are extremely harmful to coastal ocean ecosystems - Avoid farmed salmon.

fishlist.name: Salmon - Chinook
fishlist.message: While salmon tends to be low in mercury, farmed salmon contain higher levels of PCB's. Salmon farms are extremely harmful to coastal ocean ecosystems - Avoid farmed salmon.

fishlist.name: Scallop
fishlist.message: Scallop dredges cause severe damage to seafloor habitat. In addition, endangered sea turtles and other species can be caught incidentally and are discarded, often dead or dying, as bycatch

fishlist.name: Shark - Blacktip
fishlist.message: In addition to being high in mercury, many species of shark are being decimated by longline fishing fleets.

fishlist.name: Shark - Blue
fishlist.message: In addition to being high in mercury, many species of shark are being decimated by longline fishing fleets.

fishlist.name: Shrimp - Brown
fishlist.message: The majority of shrimp sold in the US comes from environmentally destructive aquaculture facilities in Asia.

fishlist.name: Shrimp - Pink
fishlist.message: The majority of shrimp sold in the US comes from environmentally destructive aquaculture facilities in Asia.

fishlist.name: Shrimp - White
fishlist.message: The majority of shrimp sold in the US comes from environmentally destructive aquaculture facilities in Asia.

fishlist.name: Swordfish
fishlist.message: Swordfishing longline fleets are one of the worlds greatest threats to sea turtles, putting some species at risk of extinction over the next 10 years.

fishlist.name: Tuna - Albacore
fishlist.message: Albacore tuna is caught using longline fishing methods that capture or kill millions of whales, dolphins, sharks and sea turtles per year.

fishlist.name: Tuna - Albacore Canned
fishlist.message: Albacore tuna is caught using longline fishing methods that capture or kill millions of whales, dolphins, sharks and sea turtles per year.
